name: dedalus-terrascope-connector
description: Unified connector for TerraScope hazard prediction (flood, wildfire, heat, storm).

tools.name: flood-risk-api
tools.description: Fetch rainfall, humidity, and flood risk data from OpenWeather.

tools.name: wildfire-risk-api
tools.description: Fetch temperature, humidity, and wind data for wildfire risk.

tools.name: storm-risk-api
tools.description: Fetch wind and pressure metrics for hurricanes/tornadoes.
